# PHPickerConfiguration.Selection

**Enumeration**

Options that represent differing selection behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Selection
```

## Overview

This enumeration defines the possible values of the photo picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/selection-swift.property].

## Selection methods

- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.default**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the default order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.ordered**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the chosen order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.continuous**: An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.continuousAndOrdered**: An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately and displays selected photos with a numbered badge.

## Setting the selection limit

- **selectionLimit**: The maximum number of selections the user can make.
- **selection**: The selection behavior for the picker.
- **PHPickerConfigurationSelection**: Options that represent differing selection behavior.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
